source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000010_RYNE<tab>Restoring the elements to the Empty may allow life to flourish there once more...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000010_RYNE<tab>Восстановление некоторых вещей в Пустоши позволит жизни снова расцвести...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000020_RYNE<tab>But that isn't enough to return the environment to the way it was. No, we need to gradually reintroduce life, beginning with plants.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000020_RYNE<tab>Но для того, чтобы вернуть всё как было, этого недостаточно. Нет, нужно постепенно завозить туда живые образцы, начиная с растений...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000030_RYNE<tab>Not just any plants, though, but those that won't be a burden on a weakened land...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000030_RYNE<tab>Но какие попало растения не подойдут. Нужны те, что не станут затруднением для ослабленной почвы...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000040_RYNE<tab>Such as...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000040_RYNE<tab>Такие, как...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Что вы скажете?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You've become quite the scholar.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Гляжу, ты в этом начинаешь разбираться.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I see you've taken an interest in gardening.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Надо же, тебя заинтересовало садоводство?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>How about coffee plants?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Как насчёт кустов кофе?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000050_RYNE<tab>Oh! What a welcome surprise!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000050_RYNE<tab>О! Какой приятный сюрприз!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000060_RYNE<tab>It seems you caught me rambling to myself. How embarrassing...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000060_RYNE<tab>Похоже, тебе довелось услышать мои разговоры с самой собой. Позор...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000070_RYNE<tab>I've been studying botany, you see, hoping that the knowledge would help our work in the Empty.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000070_RYNE<tab>Я изучаю ботанику. Надеюсь, эти знания помогут с моей работой в Пустоши.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000080_RYNE<tab>Coffee... If I recall correctly, it thrives in warm climates, with cooler nights to promote growth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000080_RYNE<tab>Кофе... Насколько я помню, растения обитают в тёплом климате, с холодными ночами, ускоряющими рост.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000090_RYNE<tab>Yes. Yes, that might be suitable.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000090_RYNE<tab>Да. Да, вполне может подойти.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000100_RYNE<tab>And with a good harvest, we could set some aside for coffee biscuits!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000100_RYNE<tab>И если будет урожай, сделаем себе кофейных бисквитов!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000110_RYNE<tab>Wait... It's you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000110_RYNE<tab>Стой... Это же ты!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000120_RYNE<tab>It seems you caught me rambling to myself. How embarrassing...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000120_RYNE<tab>Похоже, тебе довелось услышать мои разговоры с самой собой. Позор...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000130_RYNE<tab>I've been studying botany, you see, hoping that the knowledge would help our work in the Empty.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000130_RYNE<tab>Я изучаю ботанику. Надеюсь, эти знания помогут с моей работой в Пустоши.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000140_RYNE<tab>But never mind that for now. What brings you to the Crystarium? It was my understanding that the Final Days were behind us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000140_RYNE<tab>Но отложим пока этот вопрос. Что привело тебя в Кристариум? Мне дали понять, Последние Дни миновали?..

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000150_RYNE<tab>You wish to combat this otherworldly threat with the power of Light...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000150_RYNE<tab>И вы хотите одолеть эту потустороннюю силу с помощью Света?..

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000160_RYNE<tab>Please let me help.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000160_RYNE<tab>Прошу, позвольте помочь.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000170_RYNE<tab>Though I've lost my connection to Hydaelyn, I can still manipulate Light to a degree.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000170_RYNE<tab>Пускай я утратила связь с Хайделин, я всё ещё могу немного манипулировать Светом.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000180_RYNE<tab>If there is a chance I could save others with that power, then I have to try.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000180_RYNE<tab>И если моя сила может помочь другим, я просто обязана попытаться.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000190_BEQLUGG<tab>'Tis done. Zero is now with us in the flesh.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000190_BEQLUGG<tab>Готово. Зеро теперь с нами, во плоти.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000200_BEQLUGG<tab>The spirit vessel, I shall hold on to for operating the tower.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000200_BEQLUGG<tab>Сосуд души я пока оставлю себе. Он мне пригодится для операций с Башней.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000210_BEQLUGG<tab>This will help me to make sense of the controls, will it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000210_BEQLUGG<tab>Это должно помочь мне в управлении ею, верно?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000220_BEQLUGG<tab>There's a levity in his words that wasn't there before. It heartens me to know he is well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000220_BEQLUGG<tab>В его словах лёгкость, которой прежде не было. Я очень рад, что с ним всё в порядке.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000230_BEQLUGG<tab>I shall see to the preparations as per his instructions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000230_BEQLUGG<tab>Я начну подготовку согласно его инструкциям.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000240_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>My thanks for your help.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000240_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Спасибо за помощь.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000250_BEQLUGG<tab>Think nothing of it. That said, 'tis customary that my kind receive fitting payment for services rendered...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000250_BEQLUGG<tab>Не стоит благодарности. Впрочем, обычай гласит, чтобы наш народ принимал определённую плату за услугу...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000260_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Not unlike we voidsent, then. In that case, you may devour some of my aether.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000260_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Значит, как у нас, демонов. Так и быть, можете поглотить некоторую долю моего эфира.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000270_BEQLUGG<tab>Are you mad? I'll do no such thing! The very suggestion is absurd!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000270_BEQLUGG<tab>Ты сбрендила? Не собираюсь я этого делать! Какой абсурд!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000280_RYNE<tab>Now, now, let's calm down. We all have our preferences, and I'm sure no offense was intended.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000280_RYNE<tab>Эй, эй, давайте все успокоимся. У всех нас свои... предпочтения. Уверена, она не подразумевала ничего такого.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000290_BEQLUGG<tab>I shall attend to the tower now. The rest, I leave to you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000290_BEQLUGG<tab>Ладно, займусь, наконец, Башней. Всё прочее оставляю вам.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000300_RYNE<tab>Zero, was it? My name is Ryne. It's a pleasure to meet you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000300_RYNE<tab>Зеро, верно? Меня зовут Рин. Рада с вами познакомиться.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000310_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>This world isn't what I expected. While Light is indeed strong here, it's not pervasive or overwhelming. Everything looks much as it does in the Source.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000310_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Этот мир не такой, каким я ожидала его увидеть. Свет здесь действительно силён, но он не агрессивный и всепоглощающий. Всё выглядит почти так же, как на Источнике.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000320_RYNE<tab>We have the Warrior of Darkness to thank for that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000320_RYNE<tab>За это мы должны благодарить Воина Тьмы.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000330_RYNE<tab>If you're interested, I would be glad to show you around.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000330_RYNE<tab>Если хотите, могу вам тут всё показать.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000340_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Just an ordinary sky. Ordinary...and beautiful.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000340_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Обыкновенное небо. Обыкновенное... и прекрасное.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000350_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>To think that, after so much loss, they could reclaim this...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000350_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Неужели после всех потерь они смогли вернуть его?..

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000360_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>So this is the Flood of Light...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000360_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Значит, это Прилив Света...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000370_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I don't remember much of the time when Darkness consumed the Thirteenth. Just the cold and the emptiness...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000370_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Мои воспоминания о времени, когда Тринадцатый поглотила Тьма, обрывочны. Только холод и пустота...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000380_RYNE<tab>Zero? Are you all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000380_RYNE<tab>Зеро? С тобой всё в порядке?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000390_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>...Aye. I'm fine.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000390_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>...Да. Ничего.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000400_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You're the one who stopped this?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000400_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Значит, это ты остановила волну?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000410_RYNE<tab>Oh, no no. That was the first Oracle of Light, Minfilia. She's since left us, but I inherited her power and legacy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000410_RYNE<tab>О, нет-нет. Это была первая Оракул Света, Минфилия. Она давно уже нас покинула, но я приняла её силу и наследие.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000420_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I see...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000420_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Вот как...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000430_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Let's get started then, shall we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000430_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Что ж, займёмся делом, да?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000440_RYNE<tab>The other transmitters are set. Whenever you're ready.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000440_RYNE<tab>Передатчики уже расставлены. Начинай, если готова.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000450_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Such radiant Light...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000450_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Такой сияющий Свет...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000460_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>It's almost too much for one steeped in Darkness like me...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000460_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Это почти чересчур для окунувшейся во Тьму вроде меня...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000470_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000470_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000480_JULLUS<tab>Whatever may have happened in the past, you're still here, Zero. Alive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000480_JULLUS<tab>Что бы ни случилось в твоём прошлом, ты здесь, Зеро. Ты выжила.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000490_JULLUS<tab>What you couldn't do yesterday, you might still do today.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000490_JULLUS<tab>И то, что ты не сделала вчера, можно сделать сегодня.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000500_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>If this power were mine to wield...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000500_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Если бы эта сила подчинялась мне...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000510_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[CRY OF PAIN “Argh! Ahhhhhh!] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000510_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[CRY OF PAIN “Argh! Ahhhhhh!] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000520_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[ENDURING PAIN GRUNT “Urgh”] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000520_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[ENDURING PAIN GRUNT “Urgh”] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000530_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I will not succumb... Not to Darkness...nor to Light!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000530_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Я не подчинюсь... ни Тьме... ни Свету!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000540_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[PSYCHING ROAR “Yaaaaaargh!”] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000540_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[PSYCHING ROAR “Yaaaaaargh!”] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000550_RYNE<tab>Zero!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000550_RYNE<tab>Зеро!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000560_RYNE<tab>She's...taken Light into herself!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000560_RYNE<tab>Она... поглотила колоссальное количество Света!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000570_RYNE<tab>Her body struggles to contain it. She needs help.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000570_RYNE<tab>Её тело не выдерживает. Ей нужна помощь.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000580_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[FAINT GROAN “Ugh”] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000580_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[FAINT GROAN “Ugh”] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000590_RYNE<tab>Thank goodness... How do you feel?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000590_RYNE<tab>Слава благости... Как ты себя чувствуешь?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000600_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Better now, I think.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000600_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Сейчас лучше, кажется.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000610_RYNE<tab>Then you're very, very lucky. Whatever possessed you to do that?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000610_RYNE<tab>Тебе очень, очень повезло. Что на тебя нашло, раз ты решила такое устроить?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000620_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I had to know if I could command the Light. If I could change my fate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000620_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Мне нужно было понять, смогу ли я управлять Светом. Могу ли изменить свою судьбу.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000630_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Once, I would never have dared to dream it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000630_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Когда-то я не смела о таком даже мечтать.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000640_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>But your friendship and your trust has helped me to see new possibilities. In myself and everything else.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000640_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Но ваша дружба и доверие помогли мне рассмотреть новые возможности. В себе и окружающих.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000650_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Perhaps that's why, when I beheld this world once damned yet saved, I saw the potential for mine to be saved as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000650_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Поэтому, наверное, в этом мире, однажды обречённом, но спасённом, я поняла, что есть шанс спасти свой.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000660_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>To become a world where Light and Darkness are in harmony, and life flourishes. A world where we're not consumed by insatiable hunger, but filled with hope for what we might create together.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000660_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Мой мир может стать местом, где Свет и Тьма в гармонии, где расцветёт жизнь. Мир, которым правит не бесконечный голод, но надежда — надежда на то, что мы готовы создать вместе.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000670_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>If I had the strength, perhaps I could make such a dream reality. Perhaps I could awaken us from this endless nightmare.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000670_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Если бы у меня была сила, я бы воплотила эту мечту в реальность. Возможно, я смогла бы пробудить нас от бесконечного кошмара.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000680_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>That's what possessed me...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000680_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Вот почему я это сделала.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000690_RYNE<tab>If that's your heartfelt desire, then you mustn't be afraid to share it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000690_RYNE<tab>Если ты от всей души этого желаешь, не стоит бояться поделиться.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000700_RYNE<tab>There was a time when I lacked the courage. To voice my desires was to burden those I love...or so I convinced myself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000700_RYNE<tab>Были времена, когда мне тоже не хватало смелости — озвучить свои желания означало обременить тех, кого я люблю... по крайней мере, так я себя убеждала.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000710_RYNE<tab>But then I met those who believed in me. They helped me to believe in myself and find the strength to live.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000710_RYNE<tab>Потом я встретила тех, кто поверил в меня. Они помогли мне поверить в себя и отыскать волю к жизни.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000720_RYNE<tab>And so long as I'm alive, I know that I'll be fine. No matter how dire things seem. No matter where I am.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000720_RYNE<tab>И пока я живу, точно знаю, не пропаду. И не важно, насколько всё вокруг плохо. Не важно, где я.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000730_RYNE<tab>To be able to think that brought me peace, and it's a blessing I owe entirely to my friends.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000730_RYNE<tab>Способность мыслить принесла мне внутренний покой, и этим благословением я обязана своим друзьям.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Those who believe in us...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Те, кто в нас верят...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000750_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I will remember your words. I know all too well that there's a limit to what we can achieve alone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000750_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Я запомню твои слова. В конце концов, кому как не мне знать, что в одиночку всего не добьёшься.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000760_RYNE<tab>As a friend, I'd like to help you fulfill your dream.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000760_RYNE<tab>Как подруга, я хотела бы помочь тебе осуществить мечту.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000770_RYNE<tab>If you wish to take in more Light, I can keep the power in check and help your body accept it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000770_RYNE<tab>Если хочешь зачерпнуть ещё Света, я буду сдерживать эту силу и помогу твоему телу принять её.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Что вы скажете?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>If anyone can do it, it'd be Ryne.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Если кому это под силу, так это Рин.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>It worked well enough for me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Со мной срабатывало.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>With the power of Light <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> Dark, you'll be unstoppable!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>С силами Света и Тьмы ты станешь неостановимой!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000780_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>So it would seem.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000780_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Значит, я доверюсь.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000790_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ah, yes. You mentioned having to absorb Light. That you still live is proof of her ability.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000790_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>А, да. Ты упоминал<var 08 E905 ((а)) (()) /var>, что тебе приходилось поглощать Свет. Твоё выживание — лучшее доказательство её способностей.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000800_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I certainly hope so.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000800_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Именно на это я и надеюсь.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000810_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Right, then. I'm counting on you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000810_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ладно, действуй. Я рассчитываю на тебя.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000820_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Here I go.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000820_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Поехали...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000830_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[STRUGGLING TO ABSORB LIGHT EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000830_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[STRUGGLING TO ABSORB LIGHT EXERT] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000840_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I can feel it. The Light's warmth welling within me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000840_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Я чувствую это. Тепло Света, целый источник внутри.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000850_RYNE<tab>Then I believe it worked.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000850_RYNE<tab>Значит, сработало.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000860_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>With this power, I will return to the void and fight─for the world that once was, and for those I hold dear!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000860_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>С новой силой я вернусь в Бездну и буду сражаться — ради мира, которым она однажды была. Ради тех, кого я потеряла!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000870_YSHTOLA<tab>All is in readiness. Without further ado, then... Light from beyond the rift, shine forth and banish the Darkness!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000870_YSHTOLA<tab>Всё готово. Ладно, не откладывая в долгий ящик... Свет из другого мира, освети нам путь и порази Тьму!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000880_BEQLUGG<tab>Excellent. The tower is replete with Light from Nabaath Areng.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000880_BEQLUGG<tab>Превосходно. Башня наполнена Светом из Набааш Аранга.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000890_BEQLUGG<tab>Commencing transmission!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000890_BEQLUGG<tab>Начинаю передачу!..

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000900_BEQLUGG<tab>It works! It works! Light is flowing into the void!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000900_BEQLUGG<tab>Работает! Работает! Свет устремился в Бездну!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000910_LYNA<tab>May this Light illuminate your way!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000910_LYNA<tab>Пусть он освещает вам путь!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000920_RYNE<tab>You can do it, Zero. I believe in you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000920_RYNE<tab>Ты сможешь, Зеро. Я верю в тебя.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000930_ESTINIEN<tab>Look─an opening!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000930_ESTINIEN<tab>Смотрите, просвет!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000940_YSHTOLA<tab>It worked. Let us waste no time and sally forth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000940_YSHTOLA<tab>Сработало. Не будем терять времени, вперёд!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000950_YSHTOLA<tab>Alas, I fear the breach may be too narrow for you, Vrtra.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000950_YSHTOLA<tab>Увы, боюсь, брешь для тебя слишком мала, Вритра.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000960_VRITRA<tab>For a blessing, I prepared my simulacrum for such an eventuality.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000960_VRITRA<tab>К счастью, как раз по такому случаю я приготовил симулякр.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000970_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>My true form shall stand guard here while we explore the chasm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000970_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Моё истинное тело останется здесь на страже, пока мы будем обследовать провал.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000980_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>'Tis faint, but I sense the presence of a dragon. No doubt my sister's essence trapped within Zeromus.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000980_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Блеклое, но присутствие дракона всё-таки ощущается. Это эссенция моей сестры, пленённая в Зеромусе.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000990_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Not where she was held captive before, but somewhere much deeper.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000990_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Не темница, в которой она была заключена прежде, но что-то более глубокое...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001000_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>The descent will not be so easy this time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001000_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>На этот раз спуск будет не таким простым.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001010_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>The chasm swarms with voidsent.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001010_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Кратер кишмя кишит демонами.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001020_YSHTOLA<tab>Summoned by Golbez, perhaps, or born of the residual Darkness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001020_YSHTOLA<tab>Должно быть, призванные Голбезом, или же рождённые из остаточной Тьмы.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001030_ESTINIEN<tab>However they came to be, we shall cut a path through them. Is everyone ready?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001030_ESTINIEN<tab>Чем бы они ни были, придётся пробиваться. Все готовы?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001040_ESTINIEN<tab>Zero...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001040_ESTINIEN<tab>Зеро?..

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001050_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>That Light should shine in the void once more...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001050_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Невероятно, Свет вновь сияет в Бездне...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001060_YSHTOLA<tab>No single one of us could have made it so. Only by joining hands were we able to kindle this Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001060_YSHTOLA<tab>Никто из нас поодиночке такого не добился бы. Мы разожгли его, работая сообща.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Do you see, Golbez? We needn't damn others to save ourselves.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Посмотри, Голбез. Не нужно обрекать других, чтобы самим спастись.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You knew this once, surely. When you tried to befriend me. When you were one of the precious few left willing to trust in another.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Когда-то ты в это верил, наверняка. В те времена, когда хотел подружиться с мной. Когда нас, готовых довериться, осталось ничтожно мало...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001090_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>But that man is gone, and in his place a mockery of his beliefs.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001090_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Но того человека больше нет, а от его надежд осталась жалкая пародия.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001095_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001095_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001100_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>It's the same as before... Though we walk different paths, we seek the same destination. And yet...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001100_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Всё как и прежде... Пускай мы идём разными путями, точка назначения у нас одна. Однако...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001110_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>There is something I must know. A truth that lies waiting in the dark.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001110_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Мне не даёт покоя вопрос. Истина, сокрытая в темноте.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001120_DURANTE<tab>Golbez!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001120_DURANTE<tab>Голбез!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001130_DURANTE<tab>This can't be happening... Not to you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001130_DURANTE<tab>Этого просто не может быть... Только не ты...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001140_DURANTE<tab>My friend... My hero... I will stop you even should it cost me my life!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001140_DURANTE<tab>Мой друг... мой герой. Я остановлю тебя, даже если это будет стоить мне жизни!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001150_DURANTE<tab>[PANTING, DOWN ON ONE KNEE] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001150_DURANTE<tab>[PANTING, DOWN ON ONE KNEE] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001160_DURANTE<tab>Why? Why you and not me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001160_DURANTE<tab>Почему? Почему ты, не я?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001170_DURANTE<tab>You were the best of us. A paragon of virtue. I could never hope to be your equal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001170_DURANTE<tab>Ты был лучшим из нас. Воплощением благодетели. Мне до тебя никогда не дотянуться.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001180_DURANTE<tab>I am only the knight I am because of you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001180_DURANTE<tab>Я тот, кто я есть, благодаря тебе!..

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001190_DURANTE<tab>Because you believed in me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001190_DURANTE<tab>Потому что ты поверил в меня!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001200_DURANTE<tab>[SWORD SWINGING EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001200_DURANTE<tab>[SWORD SWINGING EXERT] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001210_DURANTE<tab>[PANTING] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001210_DURANTE<tab>[PANTING] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001220_DURANTE<tab>[PAINED LAUGHTER] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001220_DURANTE<tab>[PAINED LAUGHTER] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001230_DURANTE<tab>You would not wish to become a monster, preying upon those who've fought to protect. But neither can I bring myself to kill you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001230_DURANTE<tab>Ты бы не захотел становиться монстром и питаться теми, кого поклялся защищать. Мне сложно заставить себя убить тебя...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001240_DURANTE<tab>So rest easy, my friend, and entrust your legacy to me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001240_DURANTE<tab>Вечная память, друг мой. Твоё наследие теперь понесу я.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001250_DURANTE<tab>You will never die, this I swear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001250_DURANTE<tab>Ты будешь жить вечно, клянусь в этом.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001260_DURANTE<tab>Through me your name shall live on, as the hero who saves the world!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001260_DURANTE<tab>Твоё имя будет жить во мне. Ты станешь героем, спасшим мир!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001270_YSHTOLA<tab>We've been released from the memory, 'twould seem.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001270_YSHTOLA<tab>Нас выпустило из воспоминания, кажется.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001280_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>If Golbez was the one sealed in this memoria...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001280_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Если в этом кристалле заперт Голбез...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001290_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Then the one we've been fighting is...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001290_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Тогда тот, с кем мы сражаемся...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001300_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>No more than an impostor playing at hero.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001300_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Обычный самозванец, возомнивший себя героем.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001310_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Durante, I presume.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001310_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Дюранте, надо думать.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001320_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>A name long since lost to time. History shall remember only Golbez.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001320_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Это имя давным-давно стёрто временем. История будет помнить только Голбеза.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001330_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Come what may, I shall deliver the world its salvation, and I will not suffer you to interfere.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001330_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Будь что будет, но я спасу этот мир, и я не намерен терпеть ваше вмешательство.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001340_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You seek to free all souls from the purgatory of undeath. And to that end, you would invade another world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001340_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ты хочешь освободить души от ада вечного перерождения. Для этого готов вторгнуться в другой мир.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001350_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>While I cannot condone your methods, I understand your motive full well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001350_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Методы твои я одобрить не могу, но мотив понимаю очень хорошо.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001360_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>For I'm driven by the same. I too wish to save our world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001360_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ведь мной движет то же самое. Я тоже хочу спасти наш мир.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001370_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I too once thought I had to bear the burden by myself. That I had no choice but to walk my path alone. But I was wrong. We may yet strive together towards our shared goal, if you would reconsider your course.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001370_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Я тоже когда-то думала, что должна нести груз в одиночку. Будто нет другого пути кроме пути отшельницы. Но я ошибалась. Мы ещё можем объединиться ради общей цели, — только откажись от своего плана.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001380_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[CONDESCENDING CHUCKLE] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001380_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[CONDESCENDING CHUCKLE] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001390_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>If you possessed power which transcended that of Zeromus, then perhaps I would.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001390_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Если хватит сил выстоять против Зеромуса, тогда я подумаю.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001400_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>But you do not. No, you are but another voidsent, like me. And what is a candle before the sun?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001400_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Но у тебя не хватит. Нет, ты лишь очередной демон, как и я. Что такое свеча рядом с пылающим солнцем?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001410_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Perhaps we aren't all-powerful and cannot effect great change in an instant. Even so...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001410_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Конечно, мы не всесильны и не в состоянии менять мир по щелчку пальца. Однако...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001420_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Great change is what we need! Aught less has no meaning!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001420_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Нам нужно изменить мир! Никакие полумеры тут не годятся!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001430_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Having glimpsed our past, you should understand as well as any.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001430_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Вы заглянули в наше прошлое, и вы должны понимать, почему.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001440_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>As Golbez, I dedicated myself to ending the Contramemoria. I fought the corrupted memoriates, and attempted to redeem those twisted by their power.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001440_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Став Голбезом, я посвятил себя делу окончания Контрамемории. Я сражался с порчеными мемориатами, пытался вернуть тех, кто поддался искушению силы.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001450_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Yet try as I might, I was powerless to make any meaningful change. 'Twas then, when I was floundering in despair, that she appeared─the Ascian Igeyorhm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001450_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Но как бы я ни старался, желанные изменения всё не приходили. И вот тогда, в час отчаяния, явилась она — асцианка Игейорм.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001460_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Claiming to know how to excise the source of our woes, she showed me to the moon, where the servant of Light abided. 'Twas he and his ilk who had granted men unnatural powers, she said, and now prolonged the war.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001460_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Она заявила, что ей известен источник всех бед, и она указала на луну, где обитал служитель Света. Она сказала, что именно он даровал людям сверхъестественные силы, что именно он продолжает войну.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001470_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Believing her every word, I struck him down...and caused Darkness to engulf the world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001470_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Поверив каждому её слову, я убил его... и Тьма поглотила весь мир.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001480_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>What!? Then it was you who...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001480_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Что?! Значит, это именно из-за тебя...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001490_YSHTOLA<tab>As Emet-Selch once told us, the Thirteenth was the Ascians' first attempt at a Rejoining, before they fully understood the mechanisms at play.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001490_YSHTOLA<tab>Как нам рассказал Эмет-Селх, Тринадцатый был первой попыткой асцианцев устроить Схождение — до того, как они поняли механизмы процесса.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001500_YSHTOLA<tab>They failed because they sought only to awaken the sundered Zodiark without instigating a calamity in the Source. The Darkness they unleashed had nowhere else to go...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001500_YSHTOLA<tab>У них ничего не получилось лишь по той причине, что они стремились пробудить расколотого Зодиарка, предварительно не устроив катаклизм на Источнике. Тьме, которую они здесь высвободили, было некуда деваться...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001510_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Having left a ruin of our world, the Ascian fled. I was a fool to trust them. To trust in others.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001510_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Превратив наш мир в ничто, асцианка сбежала. Я был дураком, раз доверился ей. Никому нельзя верить.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001520_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Since that day, I have sought the means to undo my mistake. The world may be beyond saving, but I would at least restore the great flow.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001520_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>С того самого дня я искал способ исправить свою ошибку. Этот мир уже не спасти, но во всяком случае можно восстановить поток душ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001530_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>The dragon was an extraordinary windfall. A veritable font of aether that expedited my endeavors time and again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001530_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Дракон был неожиданным приобретением. Огромный источник эфира, который начал приближать меня к цели.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001540_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>But it wasn't enough to achieve my objective. Far from it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001540_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Но недостаточный для того, чтобы достичь её. Недостаточный...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001550_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>For an eternity, I had to bide my time. But the day finally came when I acquired the power I sought.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001550_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Целую вечность я откладывал... Но наконец пришёл день, когда я получил искомую силу.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001560_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Aye, the remnants of the Ascians' god sealed within the moon suddenly dispersed into aether.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001560_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Да, останки асцианского бога, запертые на луне, внезапно превратились в облако эфира.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001570_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>With that aether, Zeromus could be conceived. And driven by the dragon's longing for home, it shall soon arise to destroy the barrier between worlds.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001570_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Из этого эфира можно было создать Зеромуса. Вскормленный жаждой дракона вернуться домой, он мог бы разрушить барьер между мирами.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001580_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Thus will the way open to the promised land, and the death we have been too long denied.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001580_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Таким образом открылись бы врата на землю обетованную, где мы обретём долгожданную смерть.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001590_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Thus will I, Golbez, bring salvation to all!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001590_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Вот так я, Голбез, спасу всех нас!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001600_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>So that is all you have left...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001600_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Значит, это единственное, что тебе остаётся...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001610_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Say what you will. You cannot stop Zeromus's awakening.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001610_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Говорите что угодно. Пробуждение Зеромуса вам не остановить.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001620_ESTINIEN<tab>We're going after him, aren't we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001620_ESTINIEN<tab>Мы ведь идём за ним, правда?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001630_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Aye. That's why we came, after all. And besides...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001630_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Да. За этим мы здесь, в конце концов. А к тому же...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001640_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>When someone believes in you, it makes you want to believe in them. In others and yourself. Jullus was right about that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001640_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Когда кто-то верит в тебя, это заставляет хотеть доверять ему. Другим, и себе. Насчёт этого Юлий был прав.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001650_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>I had hoped to bear witness to the moment our salvation is realized...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001650_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Я надеялся стать свидетелем момента, когда осуществится наше спасение...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001660_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>But nothing must be left to chance. I will stop you here no matter the cost!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001660_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Но на волю случая полагаться нельзя. Я остановлю вас здесь, чего бы это ни стоило!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001670_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[SPELLCASTING EXERT]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001670_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[SPELLCASTING EXERT]

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001680_ESTINIEN<tab>[JUMP EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001680_ESTINIEN<tab>[JUMP EXERT] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001690_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001690_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001700_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[TAKINNG DAMAGE EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001700_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[TAKINNG DAMAGE EXERT] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001710_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Wounded as I am, I knew that I would be hard-pressed to fight you on equal terms.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001710_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Я ранен, а потому знаю, что сражаться против вас на равных у меня не выйдет.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001720_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>And so I lured you to this place, where the advantage is mine!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001720_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Поэтому я заманил вас сюда, где у меня будет преимущество!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001730_ESTINIEN<tab>The archfiends live!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001730_ESTINIEN<tab>Архидемоны живы?!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Impossible. Scarmiglione and Barbariccia were sealed in memoria, while Cagnazzo and Rubicante died in the Source...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Невозможно. Скармиглион и Барбаричча были запечатаны в кристаллах, в то время как Кагнаццо и Рубиканте умерли на Источнике...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001750_YSHTOLA<tab>You are not wrong. They are not the true archfiends, but shades born of their residual aether.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001750_YSHTOLA<tab>Всё верно. И они не истинные архидемоны, а лишь слепки, сформированные из остатков их эфира.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001760_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>If they are shades, then their strength will pale in comparison. Even should they fight as one, we may yet prevail.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001760_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Если это призраки, их сила не будет дотягивать до оригинала. Даже если они будут сражаться все вместе, мы сможем их одолеть.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001770_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>We'll tend to the archfiends. Go and put an end to Zeromus.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001770_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Мы займёмся архидемонами. Ступай и уничтожь Зеромуса.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001780_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>You'll do no such thing!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001780_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Нет, чёрта с два тебе удастся!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001790_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Go! We'll join you as soon as we can!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001790_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Вперёд! Мы присоединимся как только сможем!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001800_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[CHARGING TOWARD GOLBEZ EXERT]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001800_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[CHARGING TOWARD GOLBEZ EXERT]

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001810_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[BLOCKING HIT EXERT]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001810_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[BLOCKING HIT EXERT]

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001820_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>It is too late. Zeromus <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> awaken, and it shall devour any who come between it and its desire. Your companion is no exception.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001820_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Слишком поздно. Зеромус пробудится и поглотит всякого, кто встанет между им и его амбициями. Ваш<var 08 E905 ((а спутница)) (( спутник)) /var> — не исключение.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001830_YSHTOLA<tab>I wouldn't be so sure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001830_YSHTOLA<tab>Я бы не была так уверена...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001840_YSHTOLA<tab>Time and again, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> has faced insurmountable odds.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001840_YSHTOLA<tab>Снова и снова <var 08 E905 ((она сражалась)) ((он сражался)) /var> с самыми невероятными противниками.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001850_ESTINIEN<tab>But no matter how hopeless things seemed, <var 08 E905 ((she's)) ((he's)) /var> never given up the fight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001850_ESTINIEN<tab>Но даже в моменты темнейшего отчаяния <var 08 E905 ((она никогда не сдавалась)) ((он никогда не сдавался)) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001860_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>[KNOCKING BACK ENEMY EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001860_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>[KNOCKING BACK ENEMY EXERT] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001870_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>So long as he has strength of will to forge on, then so too shall we!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001870_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Пока у него есть силы идти вперёд, то и у нас тоже!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001880_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>So long as she has strength of will to forge on, then so too shall we!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001880_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Пока у неё есть силы идти вперёд, то и у нас тоже!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001890_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>For we believe in <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>, and <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> believes in us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001890_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ведь мы верим в <var 08 E905 ((неё)) ((него)) /var>, как и <var 08 E905 ((она)) ((он)) /var> верит в нас.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001900_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>And together, our Light can pierce blackest Darkness!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001900_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>И наш общий Свет сможет пронзить непроглядную Тьму!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001910_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[CHARGING ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001910_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[CHARGING ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001920_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[CHARGING ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001920_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[CHARGING ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001930_ZEROMUS<tab>What is this Darkness, cold and all-consuming? Where am I?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001930_ZEROMUS<tab>Что это за Тьма, холодная и всепоглощающая? Где я?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001940_ZEROMUS<tab>I must return to my world... To my home, where my kin await...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001940_ZEROMUS<tab>Мне нужно вернуться в мой мир... Домой, где ждут мои соплеменники...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001950_ZEROMUS<tab>Yes, I must return. I return. And none shall stand in my way!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001950_ZEROMUS<tab>Да, нужно вернуться. Вернуться. Никто мне не помешает!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Что вы скажете?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Release Azdaja!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Отпусти Аждайю!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I can't let you destroy the barrier between worlds!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Я не позволю тебе разрушить барьер между мирами!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001960_ZEROMUS<tab>Begone from my sight!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001960_ZEROMUS<tab>Прочь с глаз моих!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001970_ZEROMUS<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001970_ZEROMUS<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001980_ZEROMUS<tab>Graaaaaah! [Report if displayed.]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001980_ZEROMUS<tab>Graaaaaah! [Report if displayed.]

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001990_ZEROMUS<tab>I shall not perish... So long as they await my return, I shall endure...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001990_ZEROMUS<tab>Я не исчезну!.. Пока они ждут моего возвращения, нужно держаться...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002000_ESTINIEN<tab>[SWINGING LANCE EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002000_ESTINIEN<tab>[SWINGING LANCE EXERT] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002010_ESTINIEN<tab>Are you all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002010_ESTINIEN<tab>Ты в порядке?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002020_VARSHAHNBIG<tab> [ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002020_VARSHAHNBIG<tab> [ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002030_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002030_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002040_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Like all voidsent, Zeromus cannot be killed. Sealing it in memoria is the only way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002040_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Как и других демонов, Зеромуса нельзя убить. Запечатать в мемории — единственный способ.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002050_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002050_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002060_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002060_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002070_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Ah, that it should come to this...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002070_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Ох, до чего всё докатилось...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002080_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>I failed my dear friend. Fell for the Ascians' ploy and unleashed the Darkness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002080_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Я подвёл дорогого друга. Повёлся на уловки асцианцев и высвободил Тьму.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002090_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>And after an eternity of waiting, I find myself on my knees...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002090_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>И после вечности ожидания я побеждён...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002100_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>How disappointed must you be in me. In the foolishness and futility of it all...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002100_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Как ты, должно быть, во мне разочарован. В идиотизме моей бессмысленной борьбы...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002110_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[STRUGGLING TO STAND EXERT]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002110_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[STRUGGLING TO STAND EXERT]

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002120_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>No... I will not let it be for naught. I will not allow you to pass. I will triumph in my crusade!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002120_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Нет... Я не позволю, чтобы всё это оказалось зря. Я не дам вам пройти. Мой поход завершится триумфом!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002130_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>There is no triumph to be found in this madness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002130_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Никакого триумфа нет и быть не может в этом безумии.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002140_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Even if the veil were to be unraveled, it would not undo what Darkness has done to the world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002140_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Даже если тебе удастся разорвать завесу, это ничем не поможет нашему миру, покалеченному Тьмой.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002150_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Nor would it bring Golbez back. From his slumber, you know there is no return.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002150_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>И Голбеза это тоже не вернёт. Ты знаешь. Мемория — это необратимо.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002160_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You're weak and imperfect. You know it in your heart. In spite of this, do you truly believe that you can save everyone? Are you sure you will not fail?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002160_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ты слаб и несовершенен. Ты знаешь это глубоко внутри. Но даже невзирая на это ты веришь, что сможешь всех спасти? Уверен, что не оступишься?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002170_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I'm no better. Weak and imperfect and plagued by doubt. Which is why I need friends to walk beside me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002170_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Я не лучше. Слабая, несовершенная, пожираемая сомнением. Вот почему вместе со мной пришли друзья.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002180_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Light...? But how?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002180_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Свет?.. Но как?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002190_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>This is proof that I believe in others, and they in turn believe in me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002190_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Это доказательство, что пока я верю в других, они в свою очередь верят в меня.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002200_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>A light that illuminates the way in darkest despair.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002200_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>А сияние это освещает путь в бездне отчаяния.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002210_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Be it in a ruined city locked in ice or a world drowning in Light, it was with faith in one another that life endured. I see it clearly now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002210_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Будь то руины города, забытого во льдах, или мир, утонувший в Свете, это вера — вера друг в друга — позволила людям выжить. Теперь я понимаю.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002220_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>You think we are capable of the same?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002220_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Думаешь, мы тоже на это способны?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002230_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>It won't be easy. Having lived too long as voidsent, we've forgotten how to trust.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002230_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Будет непросто. Мы слишком долго оставались демонами, мы забыли, что такое доверие.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002240_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>But one thing is certain: if Zeromus succeeds and everyone dies, we'll never have the chance to try.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002240_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Но одно ясно точно: если у Зеромуса получится и все умрут, шанса попытаться у нас не будет.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002250_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You asked me to join hands with you once, and I refused. I cannot take back that mistake, but I can extend to you the same offer. We can be better than we have been.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002250_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Однажды вы просили меня присоединиться, и я отказалась. Прошлого не вернуть, но сейчас я могу предложить тебе то же самое. Мы можем стать лучше.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002260_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[SHOCKED GASP, REMEMBERING SOMETHING] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002260_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[SHOCKED GASP, REMEMBERING SOMETHING] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002270_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Of course. You were the memoriate we met all those years ago...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002270_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Разумеется. Ты тот мемориат, все те годы назад...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002280_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[BITTER LAUGHTER] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002280_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[BITTER LAUGHTER] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002290_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Yes, I remember now. We hoped you would join us in our quest to end the Contramemoria.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002290_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Да, теперь я вспомнил. Мы надеялись, что ты присоединишься к нашим попыткам прекратить Контрамеморию.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002300_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>But you rejected us outright.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002300_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Но ты сразу же отказалась.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002310_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>It left both of us discouraged─Golbez most of all. “If we could but overcome the fear that has shaped and divided us, we could change everything.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002310_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Мы оба здорово расстроились — особенно Голбез. «Если бы мы только преодолели страх, что разделяет всех нас, это бы всё изменило».

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002320_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Even in the midst of that terrible war, he never stopped believing in others. Not even at the end...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002320_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Даже во время той ужасной войны он не переставал верить другим. До самого конца...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002330_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You're Golbez now. If you would live up to his name, then you must trust in people as he did.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002330_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Теперь ты Голбез. И если ты достоин этого имени, то должен верить в людей, как делал он.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002340_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>I cannot forgive what you have done to my sister. But she may yet be saved.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002340_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Я не прощу тебе того, что ты сделал с моей сестрой. Но её ещё можно спасти.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002350_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>If you can help us see her safely home and protect the Source, then...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002350_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Если поможешь ей безопасно вернуться домой на Источник, тогда...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002360_YSHTOLA<tab>As Zero's friends, we should gladly share what knowledge we have to help you restore the void.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002360_YSHTOLA<tab>Как друзья Зеро, мы с радостью поделимся всеми знаниями, которые могут помочь вам восстановить Бездну.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002370_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>You truly believe the world of old can be ours again?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002370_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Вы правда верите, что древний мир можно вернуть?..

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002380_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I do. So long as we work together.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002380_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Верю. Если мы будем действовать сообща.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002390_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>We will disperse Zeromus's essence once more. The instant we do, you must call to Azdaja.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002390_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Сейчас мы развеем эссенцию Зеромуса. В этот момент ты должен позвать Аждайю.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002400_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Understood!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002400_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Понял!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002410_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[LEAPING ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002410_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[LEAPING ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002420_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[GASP, TAKEN BY SURPRISE] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002420_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[GASP, TAKEN BY SURPRISE] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002430_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Zero!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002430_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Зеро!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002440_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>The suffocating Darkness... Like that of the rift...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002440_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Удушающая Тьма... вроде той, что была тогда, в Пустоте...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002450_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Impenetrable... Disorienting... Untethered and drifting further away...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002450_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Неодолимая... сбивающая с толку... Готовая унести тебя...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002460_ESTINIEN<tab>Be strong, Zero! Don't give up!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002460_ESTINIEN<tab>Будь сильной, Зеро! Не сдавайся!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002470_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Hold fast to yourself! Look to the Light within!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002470_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Будь верна себе! Тянись к Свету внутри!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002480_YSHTOLA<tab>Your place isn't alone in the Dark, Zero. Not anymore!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002480_YSHTOLA<tab>Ты больше не останешься одна в темноте, Зеро!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Что вы скажете?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You can do it, Zero!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Давай, Зеро!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Are you all right, Zero?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ты в порядке, Зеро?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002490_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Hmph.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002490_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Хм.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002500_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Of course.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002500_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Разумеется.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002510_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Hmph.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002510_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Хм.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002520_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You needn't worry about me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002520_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Не стоит обо мне беспокоиться.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002530_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>With this power from beyond the rift, I can do it. I can save everyone!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002530_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>С этой мощью из другого мира я смогу. Я спасу всех!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002540_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Golbez! If you would make amends, then lend me your strength!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002540_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Голбез! Если раскаиваешься в своих прегрешениях, самое время мне помочь!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002550_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002550_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002560_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002560_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002570_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[CHARGING ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002570_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[CHARGING ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002580_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[CHARGING ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002580_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[CHARGING ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002590_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Azdaja!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002590_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Аждайя!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002600_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Hear my voice...and return to me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002600_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Услышь мой голос... и вернись ко мне!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002610_AZDAJA<tab>(-Azdaja-)Oh, Vrtra... There thou art...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002610_AZDAJA<tab>(-Аждайя-)О, Вритра... Вот ты где...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002620_AZDAJA<tab>(-Azdaja-)I am coming, Brother... I am coming...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002620_AZDAJA<tab>(-Аждайя-)Я иду, братец. Я иду...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002630_YSHTOLA<tab>Have care! Zeromus makes to resurrect!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002630_YSHTOLA<tab>Осторожнее! Зеромус возрождается!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002640_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Not if I have anything to say about it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002640_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>На этот раз я готова!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002650_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>No more, fiend!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002650_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Довольно, тварь!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002660_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>You're safe now, Azdaja. You're safe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002660_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Теперь ты в безопасности, Аждайя. В безопасности.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002670_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>To my sister, I shall offer up the eye in this vessel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002670_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Своей сестре я предоставлю Око из этого сосуда.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002680_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>We dragons bring forth progeny with our very life force. That which my eye harbors should be enough to grant her corporeal form.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002680_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Мы, драконы, создаём потомков из собственной жизненной силы. Энергии моего Ока должно быть достаточно для того, чтобы дать ей тело.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002690_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Of course, this means I shall no longer have control over this vessel. I must ask you escort Azdaja to the surface in my stead.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002690_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Конечно, это означает, что я перестану контролировать этот сосуд. Я попрошу вас сопроводить Аждайю на поверхность.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002695_ESTINIEN<tab>[CLOSED-MOUTH LAUGH “Hmph”] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002695_ESTINIEN<tab>[CLOSED-MOUTH LAUGH “Hmph”] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002700_ESTINIEN<tab>We came to bring her home, and we'll do just that. You have my word.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002700_ESTINIEN<tab>Мы ведь пришли сюда ради того, чтобы вернуть её. Даю слово.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002710_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002710_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Спасибо.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002720_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>At long last, we shall be together again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002720_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Наконец-то мы снова будем вместе.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002730_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Where are you going?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002730_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Куда ты пошёл?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002740_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Our world may yet be restored. I thought it an impossible dream once, but having witnessed your miracles, I cannot help but believe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002740_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Наш мир ещё может быть восстановлен. Когда-то я думал, что это неосуществимая мечта, но теперь, став свидетелем твоих чудес, начинаю верить.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002750_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Nevertheless, I am the villain who wrought this tragedy. And in my misguided crusade, I compounded my sins.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002750_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Но всё таки я злодей, из-за которого случилась эта трагедия. Затеяв свой безумный поход, я лишь закрепил грехи.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002760_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>My place is not at your side.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002760_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Я недостоин быть рядом с тобой.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002770_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[WEARY SIGH] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002770_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[WEARY SIGH] Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002780_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Regardless of how you may feel, by lending me your strength, you've made amends.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002780_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Вне зависимости от личных переживаний, помогая мне, ты будешь исправлять содеянное.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002790_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You've earned a new beginning.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002790_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ты заслужил второй шанс.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002795_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>It's up to you what we become to one another.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002795_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Лишь от тебя зависит, чем мы друг для друга станем.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002800_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>What we couldn't do yesterday, we might still do today. Working together.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002800_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>То, что мы не сделали вчера, можно сделать сегодня. Работать вместе.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002810_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>And should we want for strength, we need only rally more like-minded souls to our cause.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002810_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>И если нам понадобятся бойцы, нужно всего лишь воззвать к единомышленникам.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002820_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>So let's take the first step. The two of us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002820_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Итак, сделаем же первый шаг. Ты и я.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002830_VRITRA<tab>Words cannot well express my relief that we could rescue my sister, nor my gratitude to all of you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002830_VRITRA<tab>Словами не передать моё облегчение после того, как вам удалось спасти мою сестру. Огромное вам спасибо.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002840_VRITRA<tab>What of him? Golbez.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002840_VRITRA<tab>А что он? Голбез.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002850_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>He felt it would be inappropriate for him to be present at your reunion with Azdaja, and chose to remain down in the chasm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002850_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Он сказал, что не считает себя достойным присутствовать на воссоединении с Аждайей, так что остался внизу.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002860_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>If you wish to hear an apology, however, I should be glad to drag him here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002860_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Впрочем, если хотите услышать извинения, я притащу его сюда.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002870_VRITRA<tab>Nay, that shall not be necessary. By his deeds hath he demonstrated his contrition.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002870_VRITRA<tab>Нет, этого не нужно. Своими делами он уже продемонстрировал раскаяние.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002880_ESTINIEN<tab>So, what will you do now?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002880_ESTINIEN<tab>Ну, что теперь делать собираешься?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002890_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I've learned much journeying together with you. Experienced things I could never have experienced alone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002890_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Я многому научилась за время путешествия с вами. Мне открылись вещи, к которым без вас я бы осталась слепа.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002900_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Together with Golbez, I hope to do the same as we labor to restore the Thirteenth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002900_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Вместе с Голбезом, надеюсь, мы откроем ещё многое, что поможет нам в восстановлении Тринадцатого.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002910_ESTINIEN<tab>Then I suppose it's farewell for now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002910_ESTINIEN<tab>Что ж. Значит, пора прощаться.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002920_YSHTOLA<tab>Be sure to share with Golbez what you've learned of the Source and its reflections, as well as the true nature of Light and Dark.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002920_YSHTOLA<tab>Обязательно поделись с Голбезом своими знаниями об Источнике и его отражениях. Истинную природу Света и Тьмы.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002930_YSHTOLA<tab>He is as resourceful as he is determined, and will surely make the very most of the insights.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002930_YSHTOLA<tab>Он очень умён и решителен. Не сомневаюсь, он многое почерпнёт из этой информации.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002940_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Indeed. Once we've gained a better understanding of the situation, I hope we can rely on your counsel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002940_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Твоя правда. Надеюсь, как только мы тут получше разберёмся, можно будет положиться на твой совет?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002950_YSHTOLA<tab>But of course. I too shall continue probing new possibilities, the better to be of aid when the time comes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002950_YSHTOLA<tab>Разумеется. Я собиралась продолжить поиск новых возможностей, так что к следующей нашей встрече буду знать ещё больше.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002960_YSHTOLA<tab>Ah, speaking of which...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002960_YSHTOLA<tab>Кстати об этом...

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002970_YSHTOLA<tab>From ocean rise and cloudbank form,
From mountain spring and rainfall storm,
From river flow and life be born...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002970_YSHTOLA<tab>Гром и ливень, облака,
С гор широкая река,
Из ручьёв вода застыла...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002980_YSHTOLA<tab>Come forth, my servant!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002980_YSHTOLA<tab>...Явись, прислужник!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002990_YSHTOLA<tab>I revised the incantation. Which is not to say you know how it went before...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002990_YSHTOLA<tab>Я подредактировала заклинание. Хотя надёжной магии для стирания памяти не существует...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002995_YSHTOLA<tab>Are we clear?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002995_YSHTOLA<tab>Молчите, ясно?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003000_YSHTOLA<tab>Nidhana provided me with spare warding scales, which apparently provide greater protection than before.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003000_YSHTOLA<tab>Нидхана дала мне запасные чешуйки, которые, по её словам, должны защищать ещё лучше прежнего.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003010_YSHTOLA<tab>This should keep the familiar safe. So long as you give the nixie aether from time to time, it will persist and serve as a beacon for us to find you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003010_YSHTOLA<tab>Фамильяр будет в полном порядке. Давайте никси немного эфира время от времени, он никуда не исчезнет и послужит маяком, ведущим ко мне.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003020_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Already we find ourselves with a new ally. Thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003020_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ну вот, наш первый союзник. Спасибо.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003030_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>When you have the chance, please thank everyone for me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003030_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Когда представится шанс, передавайте спасибо и всем остальным.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003040_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Those in Radz-at-Han, Garlemald, Sharlayan...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003040_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Всем в Радз-ат-Хане, Гарлемалде, Шарлеане...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003050_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>...the First, and on the moon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003050_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>...На Первом и на луне.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003060_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>A lengthy list.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003060_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Вот так списочек.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>A gift for Ryne, in return for the Light she helped me harness. It's the memoria holding Zeromus.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Подарок для Рин — в благодарность за Свет, который она помогла мне зачерпнуть. Это мемория с Зеромусом внутри.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>If used to augment Darkness in the First, it may help to create balance between our worlds.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Если удастся применить его для эмиссии Тьмы на Первом, это поможет создать баланс между нашими мирами.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003090_YSHTOLA<tab>An excellent idea.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003090_YSHTOLA<tab>Превосходная идея.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003100_YSHTOLA<tab>Similarly, why not entrust the archfiends' memoria to Zero?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003100_YSHTOLA<tab>Кстати, почему бы нам не вернуть мемории архидемонов Зеро?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003110_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>In that case, I shall pass them on to Golbez. To inspire and admonish him in equal measure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003110_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Тогда я передам их Голбезу. Чтобы вдохновлять его... и напоминать о промахах.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Что вы скажете?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'll see you again, right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Мы ведь увидимся ещё?..

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>The Thirteenth is in good hands.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Тринадцатый в хороших руках.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A5_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>You should know about Unukalhai and Cylva...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A5_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Кстати, есть некие Унукалхай и Сильва...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003120_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You will, I'm sure. Just don't try to forcibly summon me. I won't come.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003120_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Увидимся, уверена. Только не пытайся призвать меня силой. Я не явлюсь.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003130_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Come what may, we will see it restored. And should we need a helping hand, I hope we can count on you once more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003130_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Чего бы это ни стоило, мы его восстановим. И если понадобятся помощники, уверена, на вас можно будет положиться.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003140_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>What? There are others from our world who seek to restore it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003140_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Что? Есть другие уроженцы этого мира, готовые помочь с восстановлением?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003150_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Then please tell them this: though we are worlds apart, in our shared objective, we walk as one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003150_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Тогда передай им следующее: пускай нас разделяет Пустота, в своей общей цели мы едины.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003160_VRITRA<tab>Sad though it is to say farewell, 'tis past time we returned home. Pray climb upon my back.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003160_VRITRA<tab>Невзирая на грусть расставания, нам пора возвращаться. Прошу, забирайтесь мне на спину.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003170_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Till we meet again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003170_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>До новых встреч.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003180_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>No matter where we are or how much time passes, our bond will endure. This I believe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003180_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Не важно, где мы теперь окажемся или сколько пройдёт времени. Наши узы вечны. Я верю в это.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003190_JULLUS<tab>Oh, it's you again. Is everything all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003190_JULLUS<tab>О, вы вернулись. Всё в порядке?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003200_ALPHINAUD<tab>So you were able to rescue Azdaja... Thank the Twelve.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Значит, вы смогли спасти Аждайю... Слава Дюжине.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003210_ALISAIE<tab>Channeling Light from the First was rather ingenious. It may fall short of cross-rift travel, but it's still an impressive achievement in my book.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003210_ALISAIE<tab>Привести Свет с Первого было гениальной идеей. Пускай это не дотягивает до путешествия между мирами, но всё равно невероятное достижение.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003220_YSHTOLA<tab>You're too kind. Suffice it to say, though, that I don't intend to rest on these laurels. There's always more to be done.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003220_YSHTOLA<tab>Ты слишком добра. И чего уж тут говорить, я не собираюсь почивать на лаврах. Это только начало моей работы.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003230_JULLUS<tab>Zero stayed in the void, did she? Well...if I had known it would come to that, I would've said a proper farewell.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003230_JULLUS<tab>Зеро осталась в Бездне, да? Что ж... если бы я только знал, что этим всё кончился, то хотя бы попрощался как следует.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Что вы скажете?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Zero took your words to heart.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Она вспоминала твои слова.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Zero sends her thanks.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Она просила передать спасибо.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003240_JULLUS<tab>Really...? I don't remember saying anything profound...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003240_JULLUS<tab>Правда?.. Я и не помню, что я такого особенного сказал...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003250_JULLUS<tab>Thanks for what? I don't recall doing anything in particular for her. On the contrary, she's the one who risked life and limb.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003250_JULLUS<tab>За что спасибо? Я и не помню, что такого особенного сделал. Наоборот, это она рисковала своей жизнью.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003260_JULLUS<tab>Still...I'm glad that she got something out of her time here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003260_JULLUS<tab>Ладно. Я рад, что она помнит о проведённом с нами времени.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003270_JULLUS<tab>As the days roll on, things will change for the both of us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003270_JULLUS<tab>Время будет идти, для нас обоих многое изменится.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003280_JULLUS<tab>But some things will remain as they are.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003280_JULLUS<tab>Но некоторые вещи не меняются никогда.
